languages.text: {n}Теодора тонко улыбается.{/n} "Да... вот я и вижу проявления династической крови в твоих жилах. Жадность, рядящаяся в одежку гордости и самолюбия. Эдельтрад, что скажешь? Весьма отличающийся от твоего ответ, не правда ли".

traits.locale_text: {n}Теодора тонко улыбается.{/n} "Да... вот я и вижу проявления династической крови в твоих жилах. Жадность, рядящаяся в одежку гордости и самолюбия. Эдельтрад, что скажешь? Весьма отличающийся от твоего ответ, не правда ли".

languages.text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"
languages.original_text: {n}Теодора тонко улыбается.{/n} "Да... вот я и вижу проявления династической крови в твоих жилах. Жадность, рядящаяся в одежку гордости и самолюбия. Эдельтрад, что скажешь? Весьма отличающийся от твоего ответ, не правда ли".

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

{n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

{n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

{n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉微微地笑了笑。{/n}“没错……我看得出来，你的血脉中流淌着王朝的血液，藏在骄傲与虚荣之下的贪婪。你怎么看，艾德萨德？这个答案与你的答案截然不同，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥多拉微微地笑了笑。{/n}“没错……我看得出来，你的血脉中流淌着王朝的血液，藏在骄傲与虚荣之下的贪婪。你怎么看，艾德萨德？这个答案与你的答案截然不同，是吧？”

languages.text: {n}Theodora sonríe levemente.{/n} «Sí... ya veo que por ti corre la sangre de la dinastía. Avaricia camuflada como orgullo y vanidad. ¿Qué me dices, Edelthrad? Es una respuesta muy distinta a la tuya, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora sonríe levemente.{/n} «Sí... ya veo que por ti corre la sangre de la dinastía. Avaricia camuflada como orgullo y vanidad. ¿Qué me dices, Edelthrad? Es una respuesta muy distinta a la tuya, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: {n}シオドーラはわずかに微笑んだ。{/n}「そう…今、私には王朝の血があなたの血管を流れているのが見える。プライドと虚栄心になりすました貪欲。それは何と言ったらいいのかしら、エデルスラド？あなたの答えとは全く異なる答えがあるみたいだね？」
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}テオドラはわずかに微笑んだ。{/n}「そう…今、私には王朝の血があなたの血管を流れているのが見えます。プライドと虚栄心になりすました貪欲。それは何と言ったらいいのかしら、エデルスラド？あなたの答えとは全く異なる答えがありますね？」
{n}シオドーラはわずかに微笑んだ。{/n}「そう…今、私には王朝の血があなたの血管を流れているのが見える。プライドと虚栄心になりすました貪欲。それは何と言ったらいいのかしら、エデルスラド？あなたの答えとは全く異なる答えがあるみたいだね？」

languages.text: {n}Théodora sourit légèrement.{/n} « Oui... Je constate en effet que le sang de la dynastie coule dans vos veines. La cupidité drapée dans des atours de fierté et de vanité. Qu'en pensez-vous, Edelthrad ? Voilà une réponse bien différente de la vôtre, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Théodora sourit légèrement.{/n} « Oui... Je constate en effet que le sang de la dynastie coule dans vos veines. La cupidité drapée dans des atours de fierté et de vanité. Qu'en pensez-vous, Edelthrad ? Voilà une réponse bien différente de la vôtre, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}Theodora zeigt den Anflug eines Lächelns.{/n} "Ja ... nun erkenne ich das Blut der Dynastie in Euren Adern. Gier im Mantel von Stolz und Eitelkeit. Was haltet Ihr davon, Edelthrad? Diese Antwort unterscheidet sich deutlich von der Euren, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora zeigt den Anflug eines Lächelns.{/n} "Ja ... nun erkenne ich das Blut der Dynastie in Euren Adern. Gier im Mantel von Stolz und Eitelkeit. Was haltet Ihr davon, Edelthrad? Diese Antwort unterscheidet sich deutlich von der Euren, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: {n}Theodora belli belirsiz gülümsüyor.{/n} "Evet. Damarlarındaki hanedanlık kanını şimdi görüyorum. Gurur ve kibir kisvesine bürünmüş açgözlülük. Buna ne diyorsun Edelthrad? Seninkinden bayağı farklı bir cevap, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora belli belirsiz gülümsüyor.{/n} "Evet. Damarlarındaki hanedanlık kanını şimdi görüyorum. Gurur ve kibir kisvesine bürünmüş açgözlülük. Buna ne diyorsun Edelthrad? Seninkinden bayağı farklı bir cevap, değil mi?"

languages.original_text: {n}Theodora smiles ever so slightly.{/n} "Yes... Now I see the blood of the dynasty in your veins. Greed disguised as pride and vanity. What say you to that, Edelthrad? There is an answer that is quite different from yours, isn't it?"
